attributes.action: Get rid of Jonathan Ross from BBC TV and radio now please.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The employment of this man by the BBC, using our money, is an utter disgrace!
£18 million pounds for what amounts to the epitome of bad taste is a gross misuse of public funds and should be stopped immediately.
This man represents the antithesis of all which true britons hold close to their hearts and memories of what put the 'Great' in Britain. Alas , fading fast.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
